chapters.title: Prologue:  Lightnings
chapters.info: King Mattin Stepaneos den Balgar, p. 21 (11)—King of Illian. Since Sammael sits on the Council of Nine, which holds most of the power in Illian, he is essentially a figurehead position at this point. He wears Illian's Laurel Crown, and rules in name if not in truth. See also Brend; Sammael.
